data.comment: The match is underway. Internacional have kicked-off.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
In the minute 4, Rodrigo Lindoso of Internacional is pulled up for offside.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Matheus de Vargas (Goianiense GO) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 9, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional at Serra Dourada.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In Goiania Internacional drive forward through Thiago Galhardo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
In the minute 15, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a throw-in for Internacional, close to Goianiense GO's area.
Internacional have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 17, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Goianiense GO's Nicolas Vichiatto breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In Goiania Internacional attack through Heitor. The finish is off target, however.
Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Internacional needs to be cautious. Goianiense GO have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 22, Can Goianiense GO capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Jean of Goianiense GO gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards Internacional a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Yuri Alberto's header is off-target for Internacional.
Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Throw-in high up the field for Internacional in Goiania.
In the minute 27, Can Internacional capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goianiense GO's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Patrick gets his shot on target but fails to score for Internacional.
In the minute 29, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Throw-in Internacional.
In the minute 33, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Internacional's half.
Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Ramon Abatti Abel awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Goianiense GO.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Internacional.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Rodrigo Lindoso for Internacional drives towards goal at Serra Dourada. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 39, Jose Roberto Assuncao de Araujo Filho for Goianiense GO is whistled offside.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Yuri Alberto (Internacional) strikes at Serra Dourada but his header is cleared.
At Serra Dourada, Goianiense GO are penalized for being offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
In the minute 45, At Serra Dourada the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Serra Dourada.
Rodrigo Moledo (Internacional) gets a yellow card.
It's Goianiense GO with the kick-off after the break.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Goianiense GO close to the penalty box.
Goianiense GO are in shooting range from this free kick.
Rodrigo Lindoso for Internacional has been booked by Ramon Abatti Abel and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 48, Important block from the Internacional defence as Chico fires in a strike for Goianiense GO.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 50, Ramon Abatti Abel awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Internacional in the half of Goianiense GO.
Everton Felipe de Oliveira Silva is booked for the home team.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO close to the penalty box.
In the minute 55, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Internacional.
Internacional's Uendel is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Internacional.
Free kick in a good position for Internacional!
Thiago Galhardo for Internacional gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
The away team replace Johnny with Damian Musto.
Mauricio is on a sub for Andres D'Alessandro for Internacional.
In the minute 61, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Internacional have been awarded a penalty in Goiania...
Ramon Abatti Abel awards Internacional a penalty but Thiago Galhardo misses from 12 yards.
In the minute 63, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Internacional's Damian Musto misses with an attempt on goal.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Goal kick for Internacional at Serra Dourada.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The home team have replaced Chico with Danilo. This is the first substitution made today by Marcelo Cabo.
In the minute 66, Marcelo Cabo (Goianiense GO) is making a second substitution, with Wellington Rato replacing Everton Felipe de Oliveira Silva.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 69, Rodrigo Moledo (Internacional) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
Goianiense GO's Willian Marlon Ferreira Moraes has run offside.
In the minute 71, Goianiense GO's Wellington Rato gets in a shot on goal at Serra Dourada. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ramon Abatti Abel blows against Goianiense GO's Jose Roberto Assuncao de Araujo Filho for offside.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 73, Internacional have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
Internacional's Yuri Alberto attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
Leandro Fernandez is replacing Thiago Galhardo for Internacional at Serra Dourada.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 75, Internacional are pushing forward but Leandro Fernandez's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Goianiense GO's Janderson Santos de Souza gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Internacional defender.
In the minute 77, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Janderson Santos de Souza (Goianiense GO) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 78, Goianiense GO make their third substitution with Junior Brandao replacing Janderson Santos de Souza.
Marcelo Cabo is making the team's fourth substitution at Serra Dourada with Matheus Pereira replacing Arnaldo.
Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
In the minute 81, Marcos Guilherme is replacing Yuri Alberto for the away team.
The away team replace Patrick with Ze Gabriel.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Goianiense GO are coming forward and Junior Brandao gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
In the minute 84, Goianiense GO drive forward but Nicolas Vichiatto is judged offside.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Internacional's Leandro Fernandez has been booked in Goiania.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Internacional at Serra Dourada.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards the home team a throw-in.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 87, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Internacional's Ze Gabriel has run offside.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Internacional.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a Internacional throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Goianiense GO.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Internacional drives forward and Leandro Fernandez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
Marcos Guilherme for the away team is judged to be offside.
Nicolas Vichiatto (Goianiense GO) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Goianiense GO close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Goianiense GO.
The match has come to a close in Goiania. The final score is 0-0.
